short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upon opening a new tab or navigating to a new page, this extension closes any earlier, duplicate tabs in the same window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Before closing the tabs, a notification is displayed. Clicking "Cancel" in the notification within a brief delay (~5 seconds) prevents the tabs from being closed.
